snippet: At least 12 children were injured in Norwalk on Sunday when they fell from a carnival ride that had lost power, the authorities said.
abstract: Eighteen people, including 12 children, are injured at a festival in Norwalk, Conn, upon falling from a carnival ride that lost power.
lead_paragraph: At least 12 children were injured in Norwalk on Sunday when they fell from a carnival ride that had lost power, the authorities said.

headline.main: 12 Children Hurt at Festival in Connecticut
